title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.3 - CO[2] Allowance Tracking System responsibilities of CO[2] authorized account representative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.3 - CO[2] Allowance Tracking System responsibilities of CO[2] authorized account representative

State Regulations

Following the establishment of a
CO
2
allowance tracking system account, all submissions
to the department or its agent pertaining to the account, including, but not
limited to, submissions concerning the deduction or transfer of
CO
2
allowances in the account, shall be made only by the
CO
2
authorized account representative for the
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-6.3

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
